dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 23, 2006 5:09 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; sjjenni@misshoudini.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright infringement
Date: Mon, 23 Jan 2006 12:26:03 -0800 (PST)
From: sjjenni@misshoudini.com
Reply-To: sjjenni@misshoudini.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

It has come to our attention that the file:
http://www.tied-and-true-tales.com/images-getit/strait-jacket.jpg

is hosted on your server.

I am the owner of the copyright of that file and it is being used without
permission.  No request has been made for such permission.

I can find no place on the web site where the there is a contact address for
the administrator of the site so under the terms of the DMCA I am contacting
you and requesting that the site be modified and/or adjusted immediately.

Please be aware that the removal of this image is a matter requiring timely
response and that its removal shall not prevent our pursuing whatever
actions may be appropriate to recover damages and/or protect copyright.


Jenni Andrews



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFD1WH/vK/XpJs6oyURAoNSAKCCGTeWwhXOkQ6/881qLzG6JhOBiwCgpgwu
1IQL/Y0K+u8eRWOiq+xjJEI=
=VK9R
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
